solution_line_template: There are {num_kindergartners}+{num_first_graders} = <<{num_kindergartners}+{num_first_graders}={k_and_1st}>>{k_and_1st} kindergartners and first graders in Ms. Watson’s class.
There are {total_students}-{k_and_1st} = <<{total_students}-{k_and_1st}={num_second_graders}>>{num_second_graders} second graders in Ms. Watson’s class.
